snippet.title: Hearts of Iron IV: Trial of Allegiance | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-Purchase Today and Receive the Exclusive Bonus Track, 'Carnaval Do Brasil'! https://pdxint.at/TOAStore

Coming March 7th 2024

Explore alternate WWII histories in "Trial of Allegiance" for Hearts of Iron IV. Lead South American nations like Argentina, Brazil, or Chile. Build a superpower or join global blocs, using regional resources and manpower for a unique, glorious future.

#hoi4 #heartsofiron4 #trialofallegiance
---------------------------------
Follow us on social media for HOI News, Announcements and other fun stuff!

Twitter - https://pdxint.at/HOITwitter
Facebook - https://pdxint.at/HOIFB

Discord - https://pdxint.at/HOIDiscord
Forum - https://pdxint.at/HOIForum
